channel.title: AI Application & Value Creation Layer - Terry Chen
channel.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

image.title: Terry Chen
image.description: Hi, this is Terry. I'm documenting my product ideas and learning notes in this blog. I'm interested in creating new user experiences through generative ai, focusing on synthesized content generation and actionable insight extraction.

item.title: OpenAI's Blast Radius
item.author: Terry Chen, Livia Li (Terry Chen, Livia Li)
item.description: How OpenAI's rapid product development affects the startup ecosystem. Strategic frameworks for building defensible AI applications in the shadow of foundation model giants.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen, Livia Li

item.title: Understanding Google: A Primer
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: Understanding the key products that made Google the tech giant today, with a deepdive on new AI features. Exploring Google's evolution from search to AI-powered ecosystem and investment implications.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen

item.title: Why Figma Wins (In the AI Era Too)
item.author: Terry Chen (Terry Chen)
item.description: How Figma's platform advantages position it to dominate AI-native design workflows, despite emerging competition from AI-first tools like Lovable.
item.dc:creator: Terry Chen
